group_1.textRight: Huh?@Masara?
Hey!@It really is you!
You stood up, is something wrong?@Are you worried about something?
...So that's it, Kokoro and a hiking@event, huh...
So you came here to buy new clothes.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you can't participate in a@school uniform, right?

group_1.textRight: Y-yes... As you might expect, a uniform@would be a little odd...

group_1.textLeft: However, all of these clothes look@the same.

group_1.textRight: Well, well, well then!@May I join you in picking something out?

group_1.textLeft: Don't you also have some reason to@come here?

group_1.textRight: Not really, I was just walking around.@So, how about it?

group_1.textLeft: ...I see, if you're fine with it,@then I'll accept your assistance.

group_1.textRight: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Tadaa!@Which of these shirts do you like more?
They're different colors, but they're identical!@They even dry quickly if you sweat.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, whatever you pick is@acceptable.

group_1.textRight: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eeh!@You're not drawn to either one?
...Hmm, then...@[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]Let's decide after trying them on!
[chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Look, look! This jacket!@It matches you perfectly!

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm not sure it suits me, but it's@performance doesn't seem bad.

group_1.textRight: Then this is the jacket!
...With that, I wonder if this white shirt@will end up looking better with it.
Then, next is...@Shoes and pants?

group_1.textLeft: We don't need to find shoes...@They were already chosen.

group_1.textRight: Ah, I see!@With Kokoro, right?
[chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]AAHH!!
There! So cute!@Look at those shorts!
That's right, but...@if you wear sports tights with them...[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]Huh?
This is a really good find!@Go and try these on!
Yes! Perfect!@It's super cute!
Does everything fit properly?

group_1.textLeft: Especially these ones...@The sports tights are easy to move in...

group_1.textRight: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]That's great!@How about buying this set?
...What is it? Do you not like it?@Want to try something else on?
You were being really quiet.

group_1.textLeft: ...That's not the case,@it's just a little strange.
...Kokoro also had fun shopping with me.
...But I don't really understand the appeal.

group_1.textRight: ...Hmm...@It's difficult to explain, but...
I like to see my wonderful friends@looking their best.
Just helping you look cute is really@fun!
...That's, um...hmm...@Do you...dislike shopping like this?
Did you have fun doing it with Kokoro?
Then, isn't that okay?@Because you don't hate it?
Me too... I'm sure Kokoro doesn't hate@being together with you.
It's just your style, after all!
[chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eeehh...!?@You don't feel the same way?
...Yeah!
